ABOUT HALOTHANE:
Conceptualized in 2010, Rochester, NYÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s HALOTHANE was originally the solo project of guitarist and vocalist Nicholas Burrell. The four-song EP "DISSENSION" was recorded and released in late 2012, and the band lineup solidified not long after with the addition of guitarist Josh Mason (THRONE OF WILDERNESS, NAZGUL, ex-NEOTHEIST), drummer Bill Rotach and bassist Joe Rotach (both of DESEKRATOR). Aggressive yet melodic and thought-provoking, HALOTHANE unleashes a twin lead guitar assault over a hard-hitting, precision rhythm section and moody atmospherics. HALOTHANE is currently writing new material for a tentative mid-2014 release.
